member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.Service.FacetRecordMapper.TryConnectInteractionToContactRecordsForMergeOperation(Sitecore.XConnect.Service.Operations.SetInteractionMergeInfoOperation,Sitecore.Xdb.Collection.Model.InteractionDataRecord)
member.remarks: Setting facet doesn't change the interaction itself, so there is no operation for the interaction and no corresponding . Saving anything in storage requires a root object, which is a in this case. So, that is why we need the code below, i.e. we create stub record for the contact, and then we interconnect the records ( and ), so the facet can be saved.
